shortdesc.ph: Enables built-in encryption with an encryption password before users join a channel.

dlentry.dd: Deprecated as of v3.1.0. Please use the method instead.

section.p: Before joining the channel, you need to call this method to set the secret parameter to enable the built-in encryption. All users in the same channel should use the same secret. The secret is automatically cleared once a user leaves the channel. If the secret is not set or set secret as null, the built-in encryption is disabled.

ul.li: Do not use this method for CDN live streaming.
For optimal transmission, ensure that the encrypted data size does not exceed the original data size + 16 bytes. 16 bytes is the maximum padding size for AES encryption.
